definitions.text: perceptible by the senses especially the sense of touch
capable of being treated as fact
examples: his brief time as Prime Minister brought few real benefits to the poor

definitions.text: (of especially business assets) having physical substance and intrinsic monetary value
capable of being perceived; especially capable of being handled or touched or felt
examples: felt sudden anger in a palpable wave
the air was warm and close--palpable as cotton
